metadata.title: CVE-2024-56777 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/sti: avoid potential dereference of error pointers insti_gdp_atomic_checkThe return value of drm_atomic_get_crtc_state() needs to bechecked. To avoid use of error pointer 'crtc_state' in caseof the failure.drm/sti: avoid potential dereference of error pointers in sti_gdp_atomic_checkThe return value of drm_atomic_get_crtc_state() needs to bechecked. To avoid use of error pointer 'crtc_state' in caseof the failure.
